column4: guys...i cannot install .. cuz it says somethin about no write permission on the instal directory..
help plz
what are you installing?  Sounds like you need to run the installer with sudo.
: its a sid meiers game :)
so you are using wine.  what game?
: Alpha Centauri.. its for linux :)
isn't that pretty old?  it might not work anymore.  but try to start the installer with "sudo ./$whatinstalleriscalled"
: how do i list my drives?
sudo fdisk -l will show your HDs
: i typed... sudo ./$setup.sh. it say the command not found
sorry the $ was just to show it was a variable, use "sudo ./setup.sh"
: still command not found  :(
you have to be in the same directory as setup.sh when you run the command
: i am :s
try "sudo sh setup.sh"
: it says... cant open setup.sh
are you running 64bit version of Ubuntu?
what about what ActionParsnip asked?
: yes i see setup.sh
does "sudo sh setup.sh" give you ANY other output other then "cannot open"
: claws@claws-laptop:~/Alpha_Centauri_iso$ sudo sh setup.sh
